commits.message: Show links to external pages in green
Indicate links to GitHub by adding GitHub's favicon

Fix broken links in the templates

This closes #17

issue.title: Clicking on a username is broken
issue.body:
When clicking on a username, it is not transitioned to the route `root.users.index`. It looks like this is broken since 94d180b565a9a3894429269ddf1b94c3a7924be9


Steps to reproduce: checkout latest `dev` branch, `bundle eexec rackup` and go to http://localhost:9292/#/nokinen/fdc. If you then click on the user `nokinen`, you are redirected to the default route http://localhost:9292/#/pangratz.

commits.message:
Fix broken links in the templates

This closes #17
Add {{ago}} handlebars helper and change lookup of value
In the repositories template, show when a repository has been updated
Fix broken links in the templates

payload.description: GitHub Dashboard using Ember.js and Twitter Bootstrap
GitHub Dashboard using Ember.js and Twitter Bootstrap

commits.message: Cleanup to use router.route instead of transitionTo
Add findQuery for getting repositories for a user
Update repositories template to use new {{action}} syntax

Show repositories of a user instead of watched repositories

Sort the shown repositories by `updated_at` attribute, where the most recently updated repositories are shown first

issue.title: Fix the on / trigger interface for adding custom events.
issue.body: Check that a method triggered by an event exists before calling it.

comment.body: You could also use the newly introduced `Ember.tryInvoke`, see https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/blob/2ffe666736b609be9652c8f183e9353b5877e436/packages/ember-metal/lib/utils.js#L367-371

issue.title: Discussion: Already exists a gem called ember
issue.body:
Look http://rubygems.org/gems/ember.

What you think about these names:

* emberjs
* embertools

commits.message:
Merge pull request #346 from bradleypriest/patch-2

Removing a stray setPath reference.

issue.title: Clicking on a username is broken
issue.body:
When clicking on a username, it is not transitioned to the route `root.users.index`. It looks like this is broken since 94d180b565a9a3894429269ddf1b94c3a7924be9


Steps to reproduce: checkout latest `dev` branch, `bundle eexec rackup` and go to http://localhost:9292/#/nokinen/fdc. If you then click on the user `nokinen`, you are redirected to the default route http://localhost:9292/#/pangratz.

comment.body:
Actually, this is a bug in the `repository` template: the `<a {{action showUser "owner.login" }} >` needs to be replaced with `<a {{action showUser this }} >`. A check for this is considered in the [router](https://github.com/pangratz/dashboard/blob/a7daa0e149fc5c37ed0da740aabe9052d4f114fa/app/lib/router.js#L73).

I leave this bug open, since the current handling in the router is not smooth...
